column4: Society for Open Reliable Transparent Ecology and Evolutionary biology
column9: from the Code of Conduct: "SORTEE is dedicated to diversity, equity, inclusion, and the free expression of ideas. SORTEE seeks to provide an environment in which diverse participants may learn, network, and enjoy the company of colleagues in an environment of mutual respect. We recognize a shared responsibility to create and hold that environment for the benefit of all." https://www.sortee.org/codeofconduct/
